column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2020
column14: I got this in the color marsala robe and absolutely love it. The fact that it's a click lipstick means you only use what you need and can prevent you from accidentally breaking it. The quality of the product is really good. This is now one of my favorite Korean brand of lipsticks.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020
column14: I purchased this red after buying the shade Coral Tutu and loving the texture on that one. These are matte but don't feel drying at all. This red shade is the perfect bright red for my pale, cool toned skin.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2020
column14: I bought this I'M MEME Tictoc Lipstick Satin for my girlfriend, and she loves it!! It has a unique design that reminds me of a mechanical pencil except for the fact that the lipstick moves very little by each button click, which totally makes sense because if it would move a lot by each click, it wouldn't be easy to put the lipstick back. Also, its tip has a very unique heart shape, which is fun and a perfect shape for a gift. She also mentioned that it is easy to use and extra soft. Absolutely satisfied with the quality of the product and will definitely buy it again!!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2020
column14: I’m in love with the cute heart-shaped design! Not only adorable but it also makes easy to apply on the lips. You can just line your lips with the tip and fill in the rest! It is nicely pigmented and lasts for a long time without drying out my lips! It is creamy and velvety but has overall matte look. Very happy with my purchase and would highly recommend!!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2021
column14: This lipstick goes on smoothly and is long lasting. This lipstick is a pretty vibrant orange that is great for the summer. Yes I would buy this product again!!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2021
column14: Loved 1 color, Coral Tutu, but was sent wrong 1 2nd time so couldn't reorder & returned it. Lipstick stays on & not too drying.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2020
column14: La presentaciòn es hermosa pero no vale su precio,considero que hay mejores lipsticks en el mercado que pueden dar mejores resultados pero en si cumple con su funcion

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2021
column14: Hard to apply to lips.  I was looking for something sheer, but this stuff is waxy and drags cross the lips.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2021
column14: My fav nude color by far and I’ve tried soooooo many different nude tones and this one looks best and most natural by FAR ! Feels great on as well !

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2022
column14: It's a beautiful color and goes on extremely smooth. I also love the convenience of having a mirror directly on the tube. My only disappointment is that it's not as moisturizing or long lasting as I had hoped.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2021
column14: Very rich and creamy texture, beautiful casual color. Little mirror on the side makes application easy and flawless.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2021
column14: Pretty color and goes on smoothly.  It just doesn’t seem to stay on very long.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2021
column14: I’m very happy with both tubes of lipstick.  They’re just as advertised, they arrived in good condition and even though I would have liked for them to be wrapped on the inside, they still arrived okay.
